name: Tier 1 Ranged Critical Hits (Levels 1-4)
description: Critical hit effects for ranged attacks at Tier 1 (Levels 1-4). Effects are relatively mild for novice adventurers.

results.text: Nothing Special - Your critical strike deals damage as normal, but no additional effect occurs.
Pinning Shot - Your projectile pins part of the target's clothing or armor to nearby terrain. Their speed is reduced by 10 feet until they use an action to free themselves.
Eye Threat - Your projectile flies dangerously close to the target's eyes. They have disadvantage on their next ranged attack.
Bleeding Wound - Your projectile leaves a deep wound. Target takes 1d4 damage at the start of their next turn.
Staggering Impact - The force of your shot staggers the target. They must succeed on a DC 10 Strength save or be pushed 5 feet.
Perfect Aim - Your incredible accuracy impresses allies. Choose one ally who can see you; they gain advantage on their next ranged attack.
Armor Piercing - Your shot finds a weak spot in the target's armor. Your next attack against this target ignores any bonus from armor.
Penetrating Shot - Your projectile tears through, dealing an additional 1d6 piercing damage.
